Rulings.Base:
1. The effect(s) to activate is chosen when you activate this card.
2. You can't choose the effect to look at your opponent's Set Spell/Trap Cards if they have no Set Spell/Trap Cards.
3. You choose which player's Deck to look at when this card resolves.
4. Only the player who used this card gets to look at the 2 top cards of the Deck.
5. You cannot Chain "Mystical Refpanel" to this card.
